data.name: Pixel Palette Creator: Tip Jar
data.detailed_description: No extra content, just a tip jar, please don't feel pressured to donate, but if you do ill appreciate it, it helps with the fees :)
data.about_the_game: No extra content, just a tip jar, please don't feel pressured to donate, but if you do ill appreciate it, it helps with the fees :)
data.short_description: No extra content, just a tip jar, please don't feel pressured to donate, but if you do ill appreciate it, it helps with the fees :)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows: 7, 8, and 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
